Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Provides for the use of common areas in housing authority projects for tenant group meetings without the imposition of a fee
Summary: Provides for the use of common areas in housing authority projects by tenant groups, committees or organizations without the imposition of a fee providing that the meeting is peacefully conducted, during reasonable hours, does not obstruct any access, and the space is reserved three days in advance.
LawCode: Add ยง62, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to the use of areas in housing authority projects for tenant meetings
